rev.desc.rev.desc: Recompiling, as a new parameter (Workflowhase) was added to the alert.schedule RAD application.
It seems that SM mismatch the following two fields in the environemnt.ocml.g/environment.ocmq.g/environment.ocmo.g form design:
now, we need to fix this issue. modify init.vars panel
added gen.ord.li in $L.file=NULL in panel init.vars when $L.copy=true
Changed 'Model Link' from 'model.link in $L.category' to 'model.link in $L.phase'
Deal with bad validation in the format control
Added the $L.file.save variable to parameters passed to alert.schedule.
Will no longer increment the total line items counter in the parent request or quote if the open process is canceled by a script.
Added "add" to the Mode parm on the schedule.alerts panel.
Added in a blank ocml record for $L.file.save
Modifed select.phase panel to pass the parent area.
On check.master.fc and check.for.subadd, changed exit condition to use not same instead of ~= to compare the formatctrl names.
Modified start.1 to set up number controls for yr-mo and Julian.
modified the build.alerts panel. Removed the 'and false' from the 'get.alert.names' exit
Now calls get.base.form.name to set up the format control name. The master.fc field in the object record is referenced instead of the filename to select the master format control record.
Added in checks for paging and auditing.

descript.descript: Recompiling, as a new parameter (Workflowhase) was added to the alert.schedule RAD application.
environemnt.ocml.g/environment.ocmq.g/environment.ocmo.g form design:
1)skip.warning
2)full.name
now, we need to fix this issue. modify update.current panel
It seems that SM mismatch the following two fields in the environemnt.ocml.g/environment.ocmq.g/environment.ocmo.g form design:
1)skip.warning
2)full.name
now, we need to fix this issue. modify init.vars panel
added gen.ord.li in $L.file=NULL in panel init.vars when $L.copy=true
SCR38712 - Panel 'copy.model'
Changed 'Model Link' from 'model.link in $L.category' to 'model.link in $L.phase'
Deal with bad validation in the format control
Added the $L.file.save variable to parameters passed to alert.schedule.
Will no longer increment the total line items counter in the parent request or quote if the open process is canceled by a script.
Added "add" to the Mode parm on the schedule.alerts panel.
Added in a blank ocml record for $L.file.save
Modifed select.phase panel to pass the parent area.
On check.master.fc and check.for.subadd, changed exit condition to use not same instead of ~= to compare the formatctrl names.
Modified start.1 to set up number controls for yr-mo and Julian.
modified the build.alerts panel. Removed the 'and false' from the 'get.alert.names' exit
Now calls get.base.form.name to set up the format control name. The master.fc field in the object record is referenced instead of the filename to select the master format control record.
Added in checks for paging and auditing.
